sentences.english: The flooding reignites one of the key debates over the construction of the Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 洪灾重新引发了就建设三峡大坝的主要争议之一。

sentences.english: They flew food and medicine to the flood-stricken area.
sentences.chinese: 他们向受洪灾的地区空运食物和药品。

sentences.english: We started a campaign for money-raising for the flooded area-Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 我们发起了一个为洪灾地区募捐的活动。

sentences.english: It is number-one priority to deliver these relief supplies to flood-hit areas.
sentences.chinese: 把这些救灾物质送到洪灾区是当前的第一要务。

sentences.english: Landing must be pass the water, this is a good practice in flood life.
sentences.chinese: 登岸必须水中过，洪灾生活好修行。

sentences.english: They have founded that the flood and flood area ratio variation is big according to flood risk analysis.
sentences.chinese: 水灾风险分析中洪灾和涝灾面积比值变化较大。

sentences.english: How serious will the impact of the Thai floods be on Asian tables?
sentences.chinese: 泰国洪灾对亚洲人的餐桌影响严重程度有多大？

sentences.english: Chan says extensive flooding may lead to loss of life from drowning and disease.
sentences.chinese: 陈指出过多的洪灾将会导致人口因溺水或疾病死亡。

sentences.english: In New Jersey, the ocean surge and rainfall caused severe inland flooding.
sentences.chinese: 在新泽西州，巨大的海浪和强降雨引发了内陆洪灾。

sentences.english: China is battling weather extremes, including drought and floods.
sentences.chinese: 中国正与极端天气作战，包括旱灾和洪灾。

sentences.english: Aid workers say children are at risk from a variety flood-related health risks.
sentences.chinese: 救援人员说，儿童身处洪灾引发的各种健康危机。

sentences.english: The bill-signing ceremony marked my third visit to the flooded areas.
sentences.chinese: 签署法令的仪式标志了我对洪灾地区的第三次视察。

sentences.english: The types of flooding were river torrents and mountain torrents.
sentences.chinese: 水灾类型以江洪灾为主，山洪为次之。

sentences.english: Heavy rain and floods have so far claimed 171 lives in 20 regions.
sentences.chinese: 迄今全国共20个省区市遭洪灾，死亡171人。

sentences.english: Flooding appears particularly severe around the city of Bobak.
sentences.chinese: 在博巴克市周围，洪灾显得尤为严重。

sentences.english: After the flood, many people contributed food and clothing for the relief of the victims.
sentences.chinese: 洪灾后，许多人捐助食物和衣物以赈济灾民。

definition: disaster-stricken/to be hit by a natural calamity
